overview:
Vendula London is totally devoted to individuality.

The in-house design team at Vendula London creates distinctive, high quality accessories that customers canâ€™t find on the high street.

Care, time and attention are spent on sourcing materials and components from around the world. The collections include everything from flip flops and ballet flats to iPad holders and cross body bags.
